title: "haha"

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plates <- list.files("../img/cars/plates", full.names = TRUE)
stickers <- list.files("../img/cars/stickers", full.names = TRUE)

make_image <- function(filepath) {
  paste0('![](', filepath, '){width=100%}')
}

make_plates <- purrr::map_vec(plates, make_image)
make_stickers <- purrr::map_vec(stickers, make_image)
```

::: {layout-ncol=2}
## License Plates

`r eval(make_plates)`

## Bumper Stickers

`r eval(make_stickers)`
:::
